Title: ‘Construction near Bellandur lake must adhere to pollution norms’
Content: The High Court of Karnataka on Wednesday directed the Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike (BBMP) and the Bangalore Development Authority (BDA) not to permit any new construction projects in and around
Author: Special Correspondent
